entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
